detaileddescription.para: br_netfilter+Iptables+NFQueue+BPF+Regex > Easy way to modify network packets on the fly!
Both of them maid things to work here.
You will need: apt-get install libboost-all-dev libnetfilter-queue1 libnetfilter-queue-dev libpcap0.8 libpcap0.8-dev Follow instructions to install libcrafter.

To use it: 1 cd Debug; make clean; make all; 2 edit your config.json file. Take a look at Debug/config.json for an example. 3 write your iptables rule to dispatch packets to Rehtse -> iptables -A FORWARD -j NFQUEUE --queue-num 0. 4 just ./RehtSe
The project works now on Eclipse Neon.
